sen.j: 朝倉 景豊（あさくら かげとよ、生年不詳 - 文亀3年4月3日 (旧暦)（1503年4月28日））は室町時代末の武将である。
sen.e: Kagetoyo ASAKURA (his birthday unknown - April 28, 1503) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the end of Muromachi Period.
Kagetoyo ASAKURA (year of birth unknown - May 8, 1503) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the end of the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに基づき、his birthday unknown→year of birth unknownに修正、ユリウス→グレゴリオ暦に修正、the end of the Muromachi periodとしました。
sen.e: Kagetoyo ASAKURA (year of birth unknown - May 8, 1503) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the end of the Muromachi period.
His father was Kagefuyu ASAKURA.
His father was Kagefuyu ASAKURA.
His father was Kagefuyu ASAKURA.
His wife was a daughter of Kagefusa ASAKURA.
His wife was a daughter of Kagefusa ASAKURA.
His wife was a daughter of Kagefusa ASAKURA.
He was also named Magoshiro.

He was also named Magoshiro.

sen.j: 父景冬の唯一の男児で、明応4年（1495年）9月の父の没後、敦賀郡司職を継ぐ。
sen.e: He was the only son of his father Kagefuyu and took over Gunji (local magistrates) of Tsuruga upon the death of his father.
He was the only son of his father Kagefuyu and took over Gunji (local magistrates) of Tsuruga upon the death of his father in September 1495.
sen.cmt: 「明応4年（1495年）9月の」→訳漏れのため訳出しました。
sen.e: He was the only son of his father Kagefuyu and took over Gunji (local magistrates) of Tsuruga upon the death of his father in September 1495.

sen.j: 景豊の姉妹は朝倉宗滴、堀江景実、鳥羽景富、青蓮華近江守ら朝倉一族に嫁いでいた。
sen.e: Kagetoyo's sisters became the wives of the member of the Asakura clan--Soteki ASAKURA, Kagezane HORIE, Kagetomi TOBA, and Shorenge Omi mori.
Kagetoyo's sisters became the wives of the member of the Asakura clan - Soteki ASAKURA, Kagezane HORIE, Kagetomi TOBA, and Shorenge Omi no kami.
sen.cmt: Omi mori→Omi no kamiに修正、ハイフン、スペース消去
sen.e: Kagetoyo's sisters became the wives of the member of the Asakura clan - Soteki ASAKURA, Kagezane HORIE, Kagetomi TOBA, and Shorenge Omi no kami.

sen.j: また、義父である朝倉景総は、当時、越前国を離れ京で管領細川政元に仕えていた。
sen.e: His father-in-law, Kagefusa ASAKURA left Echizen-no-kuni at that time to serve Masamoto HOSOKAWA, shogunal deputy, in Kyo.
His father-in-law, Kagefusa ASAKURA left Echizen Province at that time to serve Masamoto HOSOKAWA, shogunal deputy, in Kyo.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、Echizen-no-kuni→Echizen Provinceに修正
sen.e: His father-in-law, Kagefusa ASAKURA left Echizen Province at that time to serve Masamoto HOSOKAWA, shogunal deputy, in Kyo.

sen.j: 景総は一大閨閥を持つ景豊に対し、義兄弟の力を借りて、朝倉宗家に謀叛を起こすよう唆し、景豊もこの企てに同意した。
sen.e: Kagefusa urged Kagetoyo having a big family to betray the Soke (the head family or house) of Asakura with help of his brothers-in-law, and Kagetomi agreed to this plot.
Kagefusa urged Kagetoyo having a big family to betray the Soke (the head family or house) of Asakura with help of his brothers-in-law, and Kagetoyo agreed to this plot.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、Kagetomi→Kagetoyoに修正
sen.e: Kagefusa urged Kagetoyo having a big family to betray the Soke (the head family or house) of Asakura with help of his brothers-in-law, and Kagetoyo agreed to this plot.

sen.j: 景総の軍勢は近江国から越前へ向かい、越前国内では景豊とその義兄弟の軍勢が蜂起する手筈であったが、義兄弟達は誰もこの企てに乗らなかった。
sen.e: The Kagefusa's army planed to leave the Province of Omi for Echizen and expected the army of Kagetoyo and his brothers-in-law to rise in revolt within Echizen Province, but any of the brothers-in-law did not take part in the plot.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The Kagefusa's army planed to leave Omi Province for Echizen and expected the army of Kagetoyo and his brothers-in-law to rise in revolt within Echizen Province, but any of the brothers-in-law did not take part in the plot.
sen.cmt: the Province of Omi→Omi Provinceに修正
sen.e: The Kagefusa's army planed to leave Omi Province for Echizen and expected the army of Kagetoyo and his brothers-in-law to rise in revolt within Echizen Province, but any of the brothers-in-law did not take part in the plot.

sen.j: そのうちの一人朝倉宗滴は文亀3年（1503年）3月晦日、直ちに謀叛の企てを当主朝倉貞景 (9代当主)に注進した。
sen.e: One of the brothers, Soteki ASAKURA immediately informed Sadakage ASAKURA, the head of the clan (the ninth head), of the plot on the end of March, 1503.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: One of the brothers, Soteki ASAKURA immediately informed Sadakage ASAKURA, the head of the clan (the ninth head), of the plot on May 5, 1503.
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正 (*「3月晦日」は3月29日として変換しました)
sen.e: One of the brothers, Soteki ASAKURA immediately informed Sadakage ASAKURA, the head of the clan (the ninth head), of the plot on May 5, 1503.

sen.j: 貞景は数千騎を率いて敦賀に向かい、4月3日、景豊の居城敦賀城を完全に包囲した。
sen.e: Sadakage led thousands of soldiers to head for Tsuruga and completely seized the Tsuruga-jo Castle where Kagetoyo resided on April 3.
Sadakage led thousands of soldiers to head for Tsuruga and completely seized the Tsuruga-jo Castle where Kagetoyo resided on May 8.
Sadakage led thousands of soldiers to head for Tsuruga and completely seized the Tsuruga-jo Castle where Kagetoyo resided on May 8.

sen.j: 景総の軍勢到着も間に合わず、景豊は包囲軍と合戦の後、自害して果てた。
sen.e: Kagefusa's army did not arrived in time and Kagetoyo killed himself after a fight with the seizing army.
Kagefusa's army did not arrived in time and Kagetoyo killed himself after a fight with the seizing army.
Kagefusa's army did not arrived in time and Kagetoyo killed himself after a fight with the seizing army.

sen.j: なお、男児が二人（九郎兵衛、春蘭軒）いたが助命されたようである。
sen.e: For reference, his two sons (Kurobei and 春蘭軒) seems to have survived out of mercy.
